TopicTitle: Crash to desktop during vehicle assembly

Articles.Content:
I just installed KSP on by Ubuntu based laptop. When I start the game, it reproducibly crashes to desktop whenever I click on the parachute during vehicle assembly. Are there any settings I can tweak to prevent this?

Thanks!

We'll need a lot more info in order to diagnose your problem. screenshots, log files, the works. Read this thread for more info

Welcome to the forums!
Probably this bug. Community fix here.

Thanks, the bug fix mod seems to have fixed the issue. Next time I'll post more info initially. And of course for my test build I forgot to put the booster and parachute into different stages..... Good to be back to playing KSP!
